div.head: 夾驚傷寒
div.div: fright related harm caused by cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: fright related harm caused by cold

sense.def: Pathological Condition of children suffering from shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, together with high fever and fright. You you xin shu 幼幼新書 10: 夾驚傷寒候：渾身壯熱，心躁發渴， 睡裏多驚 , “Signs of fright related harm caused by cold : the entire body is very hot. The heart is restless, and one develops thirst. While sleeping [patients] are often frightened”.
